note.p: Pharmacist. Fellow of the Chemical Society from 1873. Worked at Savory & Moore’s Laboratory in Bond Street, London, in 1875. Co-author of The tea we drink: a demand for safeguards in the interest of the public and producer (1901).
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/697/114/5)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 November 2013)
